biography: Border 2 is a 2026 Indian Hindi-language epic action war film co-written and directed by Anurag Singh. A standalone sequel to J. P. Dutta's 1997 film Border, it was produced by Bhushan Kumar, Krishan Kumar, J. P. Dutta, and Nidhi Dutta under the banners of T-Series Films and J. P. Films.
aiSummary: T. S. Kler is a electrophysiology specialist with an H-index of 7 at Cardiology (Member). Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
